entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
